MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L6 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Parton Street and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13pm on 1st February 2021.
